_aChangeLog.text: Added : Shooting stand, Customizable FFA (the game oustide), A game I can't name (replaced the climb)
Gameplay update : Not obvious games now have a small tutorial
Gameplay update : Path to game has been made explicit (signs)
Gameplay update : Paths to the games have been improved to provide a more flexible way to lead the prisoners through the games
Misc : The music has been compressed in order to reduce the growing size of the map

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Keep in mind that this map has not been tested on a multiplayer server. Thus it might be buggy, and more likely, unbalanced.

Please provide feedback and suggestion and notify me if you add the map your server :)

(I already found some in the map , but if you find grammar mistakes, notify me too)

_sText:
MAP UPDATED | Please provide feedback on the beta !

Ba_jail Aperture Science

Hi everyone, here is my first map: ba_jail aperture science.

This map countain:

•Death Race

•Simone

•Climb

•Club

•Musical chair

•LR Room : Gun toss + shot 4 shot

•Hot potato

•Capture the flag

•Skipping rope

•HDR

•A certain number of secrets

•A cake !

This map also contain a map level system. This system count the defeats of a team and gives them a bonus based on the number. This is an automatic balancing.
More about me

If you downloaded this map, please let me know what you think about it, it take only 30 seconds to write a little message :). If you upload this map or want to edit it for your server, let me know ! Maybe i can do the changes for you !

Enjoy !
